content: in this legal case a court in naples has issued a final ruling in a civil dispute between two parties the ruling grants one party the entire apartment located in naples and orders the other party to pay a certain amount to the coheirs as their share the court also orders the other party to pay a specific amount to the plaintiffs for their use of the property from february 2012 to february 2023 along with legal interest the defendant is also required to reimburse the plaintiffs for the costs of litigation the court applied article 720 of the civil code regarding nondivisible real property overall the court has divided the inherited property assigned a value to the apartment and made various financial orders in favor of the plaintiffs

metadata.cost: 231'300,00 inheritance value and 15'420.00 EUR of compensation and 14'000.00 EUR of litigation fees
